Create Autoencoder Function

{% raw %}

auto_encoder[source]

auto_encoder(enc_shape, device=device(type='cpu'))

if input_dim > output_dim: raise Exception("Output dimension is greater than input dimension. Why embed? Mu.")

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Example of Creating Autoencoder

{% raw %} 
encoder, decoder = auto_encoder(enc_shape = [3, 4, 8, 8, 4, 2])
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
encoder

Sequential(
  (0): Linear(in_features=3, out_features=4, bias=True)
  (1): LeakyReLU(negative_slope=0.01)
  (2): Linear(in_features=4, out_features=8, bias=True)
  (3): LeakyReLU(negative_slope=0.01)
  (4): Linear(in_features=8, out_features=8, bias=True)
  (5): LeakyReLU(negative_slope=0.01)
  (6): Linear(in_features=8, out_features=4, bias=True)
  (7): LeakyReLU(negative_slope=0.01)
  (8): Linear(in_features=4, out_features=2, bias=True)
)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
decoder

Sequential(
  (0): Linear(in_features=2, out_features=4, bias=True)
  (1): LeakyReLU(negative_slope=0.01)
  (2): Linear(in_features=4, out_features=8, bias=True)
  (3): LeakyReLU(negative_slope=0.01)
  (4): Linear(in_features=8, out_features=8, bias=True)
  (5): LeakyReLU(negative_slope=0.01)
  (6): Linear(in_features=8, out_features=4, bias=True)
  (7): LeakyReLU(negative_slope=0.01)
  (8): Linear(in_features=4, out_features=3, bias=True)
)
{% endraw %}
